scripts.dev: mkdir dist || true && ln -rs server/* dist/ && BASE_URL=./api ./node_modules/.bin/parcel watch client/index.html -d dist --public-url ./ & php -S localhost:8080 -t dist
scripts.build: BASE_URL=./api ./node_modules/.bin/parcel build client/index.html --public-url ./ --out-dir dist && cp -R server/* dist
